issue.title: [C++] Kernel functions for computing minimum and maximum of an array in one pass
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1564](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1564). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is useful for determining whether a small-range integer O( n ) sort can be used in some circumstances. Can also be used for simply computing array statistics
